review: Works great. Just wish there was a picture viewer app

review: Works awesome...save lots of money on cable packages I don't need anymore at the second house.

review: Great for You Tube and a few other applications including Crackle. Wish there were more compatible apps.

review: Best for streaming from phones or tablet in the house...you can stream remotely from laptop to TV (both in different room)..one of the must have device..very convenient & handy

review: Makes life simpler.Easy to set-up and lets you multi-task on your laptop.I dont watch tv on cable so I use it mostly to stream netflix on my tv and football games.

review: Easy to install and works great!

review: It's a great gadget for family. My son, wife and myself enjoy everyday together many videos in YouTube.

review: Is not compatible wit my Centurylink Wifi. Will send back if it won't work.
